display_long_description:
# Welcome to the world of **HARD BULLET.**

Prepare for **brutal and destructive** combat where imagination is your weapon. HARD BULLET offers immersive action with endless enemies in **RIDE Mode**, custom rules in **Sandbox Mode**, and skill tests in the **Arena**.

**Your path to brutal glory is about to begin.**

# Slow Motion and Tricks
Control time, perform slow-motion jumps, leg kicks, dual-wield guns, and deliver powerful punches.
[media]

# Fast-paced Action
Inspired by classic Hong Kong action movies, bringing high-energy mature combat to your VR headset.
[media]

# Physical Interactions
Disarm enemies, steal weapons, use leg kick, and perform one-handed reloads with our innovative physics setup.
[media]

# Weapons
Over 100 iconic pistols, submachine guns, shotguns, and rifles, all beautifully crafted with custom skins and a collection of melee.
[media]

# Progression
Dive into RIDE runs to gain experience & unlockables!
[media]

# Sandbox & Arena
Use the ammo workshop, giant generator, and welding machine to build your own crazy weapons in this creative mode. 
[media]

- **Welding Tool:** Combine any in-game objects into one! Create custom weapons, machines, or monsters using guns, props, and even enemies.
- **Enemy Customization:** Create a giant you can climb up or dwarves, immortal zombies, or just change their fancy outfits!
- **Spawner Tool:** Spawn any objects, anywhere, it's your playground!

# Sandbox & Arena
Use the ammo workshop, giant generator, and welding machine to build your own crazy weapons in this creative mode. 
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819323_3597752953854380_288576710630235383_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DMkixGNXJBYQ7kNvwGuMabC&_nc_oc=AdmEAd8iBZ1pbMDRGYS5AJR4VUuVnVvw4MliuCiFmMOeSCFuh6str9hdxlRMpZTanAc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=feQQzoc-ko_yu3eJTDnyow&oh=00_AfQC4dKhPD0kO9V3xwjVsFbpmRGK9llAt_5PTjhmVVqbIg&oe=68876EA5)

- **Welding Tool:** Combine any in-game objects into one! Create custom weapons, machines, or monsters using guns, props, and even enemies.
- **Enemy Customization:** Create a giant you can climb up or dwarves, immortal zombies, or just change their fancy outfits!
- **Spawner Tool:** Spawn any objects, anywhere, it's your playground!
